select count(*) as cnt from project_diet.members where 1=1
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
;

SELECT members.USER_ID, members.NAME, gender.Gender, members.PASSWORD, members.PHONENUMBER, members.ADDRESS, members.EMAIL, CASE WHEN dormant_accounts.DORMANT = '휴면' THEN '회원' WHEN dormant_accounts.DORMANT = 'NOT_휴면' THEN '탈퇴' END AS DORMANT FROM project_diet.members INNER JOIN project_diet.gender ON members.Gender_UID = gender.Gender_UID INNER JOIN project_diet.dormant_accounts ON dormant_accounts.DORMANT_UID = members.DORMANT_UID
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
AND USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')
LIMIT #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale};

SELECT CO.COMMUNITY_ID, CA.CATEGORY, CO.COMMUNITY_TITLE, CO.COMMUNITY_DATE, CO.USER_ID FROM community as CO INNER JOIN members AS M ON CO.USER_ID = M.USER_ID LEFT JOIN category AS CA ON CO.CATEGORY_ID = CA.CATEGORY_ID ORDER BY CO.COMMUNITY_DATE DESC;

SELECT T_SR.USER_ID, T_SR.DATE_TIME ,T_S.SURVEY_TYPE_ID, T_SR.SURVEY_UID FROM MEMBERS as T_M INNER JOIN SURVEYRESULT AS T_SR ON T_M.USER_ID = T_SR.USER_ID INNER JOIN SURVEY AS T_S ON T_SR.SURVEY_UID = T_S.SURVEY_UID GROUP BY T_S.SURVEY_UID, T_SR.DATE_TIME, T_S.SURVEY_TYPE_ID, T_SR.SURVEY_UID ORDER BY T_SR.DATE_TIME DESC;
